article.title: Air Force Awards Raytheon Contract for Missile Production
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Air Force is awarding an undefinitized-with-firm-fixed-price contract to Raytheon Missile Systems for an amount not to exceed $23 million. This action provides for production quantities of 70 Maverick Missiles and 1Guidance and Control Section for a Maverick Missile.
